name: 3 Days in the Abyss
description:
Gameplay:
The game takes place in a 2D pixel/retro style top down hellish environment filled with fire, lava, thorns and traps. The player plays as the spirit of Jesus Christ and you must collect keys to unlock prison gates, destroy demons and avoid traps and fire to find the exit before time runs out. The aim is to collect as many souls as you can to destroy the 'Altars' which contains the keys to escape each level, so that you can get to the end to defeat the evil one.Story:
2,000 years ago on the day Jesus was crucified and died on the cross. He descended to hell for 3 days and nights. He went to the place where the souls of the many righteous people who have been trapped for thousands of years since the time of Adam. This is so that he can free them and lead them into paradise.
